title: Bouillabaisse with fresh shrimps and squid, chilli croûtons and rouille
description: A luxurious fish stew that's a twist on the classic bouillabaisse recipe with crunchy croûtons and a kick of chilli.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz fish bones, roughly chopped (ask your fishmonger for these)
300g/10½oz fish fillets (sea bream, gurnard and hake), sliced
150ml/5fl oz chilli oil (reserved from the soup, add extra oil if needed to make it up to 150ml/5fl oz)
